button1.title: COMPENDIUM OF WITTY RETORTS
button1.text: This book contains a manual for how to say funny and witty things to liven up a conversation.

button2.title: A LOVERS GUIDE TO THE FAIRER SEX
button2.text: This book is a manual on how to talk to women, but also how to talk about women to other men.

button3.title: THE ART OF TELLING LIES
button3.text: This book contains tips and tricks for getting away with lies and deception.
